tool_description: This API will give you cycling data of UCI related events like teams, riders and races
name: Cycling data API
title: Cycling data API

api_list.name: GET Race
api_list.description: This endpoint will return data on a specific race like classifications and winners

required_parameters.name: raceCategory
required_parameters.description: Race category of the race, refer to GET Races for details of which is acceptable

optional_parameters.name: afterStage
optional_parameters.description: After which stage of the race do you want the classification

optional_parameters.name: classification
optional_parameters.description: Classification that you need like GC, Points, KOM, Youth, Teams and Stage

api_list.name: GET Races
api_list.description: This endpoint will give all races from the UCI calendar

optional_parameters.name: category
optional_parameters.description:
Default is world-tour
Possible values are :
world-tour
world-championships
africa-tour
asia-tour
europe-tour
oceania-tour
men-junior
women-elite
women-junior
america-tour
women-world-tour
pro-series
nations-cup

api_list.name: GET Riders
api_list.description: This endpoint will return you all cyclists in the UCI

api_list.name: GET Teams
api_list.description: This will five you data on every teams in the UCI
